Project Nature: "(T26) To upgrade the hardware platform of a mission critical IT system riding on Java EE and Oracle RDBMS technologies and to migrate selected servers of this IT system to the Government Cloud (GCIS)."
Duties: "- Serve a contract assignment under InfoTech's headcount, full-time second to serve the REO; ;. To study the architecture design of the system;. To participate in designing the new architecture of the system;. To participate in planning the upgrade / migration;. To coordinate with vendors and support teams inside and outside the Government as to facilitate the upgrade / migration;. To monitor and troubleshoot setup and configuration problems during the upgrade / migration;. To design and execute test plans for the new architecture, e.g. local resilience tests, site failover tests, etc.;. To support and participate in drills;. To maintain documentation relevant to the upgrade / migration;. To provide nursing and maintenance support to the upgraded / migrated system;. To support any other duties as to support the upgrade / migration ;"
Requirements: "Please refer to the technical and non-technical requirements. ;Technical Skills: ;. At least 4 years' experience in IBM AIX Unix (IBX); ;. At least 4 years' experience in Unix/Linux Shell Scripting (ULS); ;. At least 4 years' experience in WebSphere Application Server (WAS); ;. At least 3 years' experience in IBM AIX Administration (IAA); ;. At least 3 years' experience in Server Virtualisation Technology (SVT); ;. At least 3 years' experience in Disaster Recovery Planning (DRP); ;. 1 year's experience in EGIS (EGI) is an advantage; ;. 1 year's experience in Apache Web Server (AWS) is an advantage; ;. 1 year's experience in batch job monitoring (BJM) is an advantage; ;. 1 year's experience in System Backup Operation (BKO) is an advantage; ;. 1 year's experience in Linux System Administration (LIN) is an advantage; ;. 1 year's experience in Storage Area Network (SAN) is an advantage. ;Non-technical Skills: ;. At least 1 year's experience in IT procurement (PRO); ;. Good coordination skills is an advantage; ;. 1 year's experience in work with the Government (GOV) is an advantage; ;. Good spoken English is an advantage; ;. Good written English is an advantage. ;- Bachelor's degree/Higher Diploma in Computer Science, IT or equivalent; ;- At least 5 years' post-qualification experience in which at least 2 years' relevant experience in a similar post and in a comparable capacity."

Project Nature: "(T26) (I) Development of a flexible application processing and workflow management system (APWMS) to digitize the administration of all current and future research funding schemes of the RGC."
Duties: "- Serve a contract assignment under InfoTech's headcount, full-time second to serve the UGC; ;(I) To collaborate with the contractor, stakeholders, and team members in planning and managing all phases of the new system project, including business process reengineering (BPR), system analysis and design (SA&D), procurement and installation of computer systems, programming, implementation, testing, system nursing, and maintenance. Details of the duties include:;1. Monitoring and managing the performance of the contractor;;2. Carrying out quality control and assurance, managing project, scrutinizing project reports and specifications;;3. Monitoring and overseeing user requirements gathering and the related analysis;;4. Monitoring, overseeing and providing advice on the BPR study;;5. Monitoring, overseeing and providing advice on SA&D;;6. Coordinating meetings with users and the contractor;;7. Procuring system and database services / computer software and hardware;;8. Preparing contingency plans and drills;;9. Planning, monitoring and performing system/UAT testing;;10. Managing and overseeing the operation of the new system;;11. Planning and overseeing the expansion of the system to cover other funding schemes after rolling out.;;(II) To be responsible for the maintenance and enhancement of the existing electronic systems. Details of the duties include:;1. Installing / maintaining / upgrading computer software and hardware;;2. Procuring system and database services / computer software and hardware;;3. Conducting impact analysis and determining necessary changes on applications due to software or environmental changes;;4. Performing SDLC activities in application or upgrade projects including requirement analysis, prototyping, functional design, technical analysis, implementation, documentation, SIT and UAT and rollout;;5. Working closely with subject teams in the Department and business users to ensure technical compatibility and user satisfaction;;6. Responsible for system implementation, development, maintenance, testing, training and enhancement of business application in SDLC. ;"
Requirements: "1. Have a master degree in Information Technology or related disciplines;;2. Have qualification related to Project Management;;3. Have good written skills in Chinese and English and fluent in these spoken languages;;4. Strong understanding of IT security principles and best practices in system development and maintenance stage;;5. Have solid experience in development and maintenance of web application systems, programming experiences in J2EE, MySQL, MSSQL, VMware, Linux system, JBoss application server, web development, HTTP protocol;;6. Have proven experience in vendor management, contract management and IT outsourcing;;7. Possess good interpersonal skills, capable of working independently and under pressure;;8. Have project development experience in funding scheme system;;9. Preference will be given to those who have working experience in the HKSAR Government projects. ;Technical Skills: ;. At least 10 years' experience in IT Application Development and Management (ADM); ;. At least 10 years' experience in System Implementation and Maintenance/Support (SIM); ;. At least 7 years' experience in Project Management Professional (PMP) (PMP); ;. At least 7 years' experience in JavaScript Programming (JAP); ;. At least 7 years' experience in JBoss Application Server (JAS); ;. 7 years' experience in JAVA Programming (JAV) is an advantage; ;. 7 years' experience in Structured Query Language (SQL) is an advantage; ;. 6 years' experience in Server Virtualisation Technology (SVT) is an advantage; ;. 6 years' experience in SQL*PLUS/PL/SQL/PRO*C (OPL) is an advantage; ;. 6 years' experience in Web Programming (WEB) is an advantage; ;. 6 years' experience in J2EE Development (JDE) is an advantage; ;. 6 years' experience in Java Servlet Programming (JSP) is an advantage; ;. 6 years' experience in Disaster Recovery Planning (DRP) is an advantage; ;. 6 years' experience in HTML version before HTML5 (HTM) is an advantage; ;. 6 years' experience in Java Application Framework (e.g. Struts (Apache)) (JAF) is an advantage; ;. 5 years' experience in MySQL (MSQ) is an advantage; ;. 3 years' experience in Microsoft SQL Server (MSS) is an advantage; ;. 3 years' experience in Storage Area Network (SAN) is an advantage; ;. 3 years' experience in Windows Server 2008/2012 (W12) is an advantage. ;Non-technical Skills: ;. At least 6 years' experience in Business Process Modeling (BPM); ;. At least 6 years' experience in project development in specified business areas (PDE); ;. 6 years' experience in project management (PRM) is an advantage; ;. 6 years' experience in IT procurement (PRO) is an advantage; ;. Good coordination skills is an advantage; ;. 6 years' experience in work with the Government (GOV) is an advantage; ;. 6 years' experience in Government procurement/disposal procedures (GPD) is an advantage; ;. 6 years' experience in Government tendering procedures (GTP) is an advantage; ;. 6 years' experience in managing Government projects (MGP) is an advantage. ;- Bachelor's degree/Higher Diploma in Computer Science, IT or equivalent; ;- At least 12 years' post-qualification experience in which at least 6 years' relevant experience in a similar post and in a comparable capacity."

Location Base: Yau Ma Tei or Wan Chai
Project Nature: "(T26) Web-based application system for Transport Department"
Duties: "- Serve a contract assignment under InfoTech's headcount, full-time second to serve the TD; ;To support the implementation/on-going maintenance/system enhancement of e-Services and related internal system and monitor the performance of external contractor. ;"
Requirements: "1. To assist in the project management including preparation of Project Management Plan for project implementation;2. Possess experience and skills in design and support of IT web application systems using Enterprise Java application and modern web framework (i.e react.js) etc; ;3. To prepare and issue assignment brief for project implementation/enhancement and evaluation of proposal from vendors as well as perform quality review on the deliverables submitted by contractors;4. To monitor the performance of external contractor for providing on-going support services and system enhancement service and perform quality review on the deliverables submitted by contractors;5. To liaise with parties concerned (including users, contractors, computer operators, etc.) for requirement, implementation and on-going activities support;6. To support users to conduct UAT and other testing like Load/Stress Test, penetration test, etc.;7. To advise users on all-IT related aspects of the supported systems ;Technical Skills: ;. At least 2 years' experience in Electronic Service Delivery (ESD); ;. At least 2 years' experience in J2EE Development (JDE); ;. At least 1 year's experience in Production Database Support (PDS); ;. At least 1 year's experience in IT Security (ITS); ;. At least 1 year's experience in EGIS (EGI); ;. 2 years' experience in Server Virtualisation Technology (SVT) is an advantage. ;Non-technical Skills: ;. At least 2 years' experience in IT service/outsourcing management (OUT); ;. At least 1 year's experience in managing Government projects (MGP); ;. 1 year's experience in Government procurement/disposal procedures (GPD) is an advantage. ;- Bachelor's degree/Higher Diploma in Computer Science, IT or equivalent; ;- At least 4 years' post-qualification experience in which at least 1 year's relevant experience in a similar post and in a comparable capacity."
